skip_opening_helptext: Skip the opening cutscene on boot.
play_opening_helptext: Play the opening cutscene on boot.
update_found_message: An update for Cobalt has been found. Install it?
phoenix_mode_help: Fallen units quickly return to battle.
support_outfit_item_enabled_helptext: Use battle outfits in support cutscenes.
support_outfit_item_disabled_helptext: Use default outfits in support cutscenes.
reload_game_data_text: This process can take up to 10 seconds.
cobalt_settings_submenu_item_helptext: Show the settings added by Cobalt.
cobalt_settings_submenu_title: Adjust Cobalt settings to your liking.
plugin_settings_submenu_item_helptext: Show the settings added by plugins.
plugin_settings_submenu_title: Adjust plugin settings to your liking.
render_scale_helptext: Higher values will increase visual quality.
render_scale_toggle_enabled_helptext: Render scale setting will be applied.
render_scale_toggle_disabled_helptext: Render scale setting will be ignored.
lod_helptext: Higher values will increase view distance.
